api/JMRSDKExampleSnippets.FocusManager.h.title: Class FocusManager | JMR Samples
api/JMRSDKExampleSnippets.FocusManager.h.keywords: Class FocusManager Example of using focus- On focus enter changes color to green, On focus exit changes color to gray. Inheritance Object FocusManager Implements IFocusable Namespace : JMRSDKExampleSnippets Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public class FocusManager : MonoBehaviour, IFocusable Remarks No need to add global listener here because focus is done for the particular gameobject. Fields ThisMaterial The material assigned to this gameobject mesh Declaration public Material ThisMaterial Field Value Type Description Material Methods OnFocusEnter() Gets called when laser pointer focuses on the gameobject. Declaration public void OnFocusEnter() Remarks Sets the material color to green. OnFocusExit() Gets called when laser pointer exits focus from the gameobject. Declaration public void OnFocusExit() Remarks Sets the material color to gray. Start() Get the material assigned to this gameobject. Declaration public void Start() Implements IFocusable

index.html.title: Focus | JMR Samples
index.html.keywords: Focus Usage Exapmle of OnFocusEnter and OnFocusExit Scripts FocusManager.cs Shows example of accessing callbacks called during focus enter and focus exit. Interfaces to implement focus funtionality cs public class FocusManager : MonoBehaviour, IFocusable Methods to implement focus funtionality cs public void OnFocusEnter() { } public void OnFocusEnter() { } How to use? Download and unzip this project. Open the project using Unity Hub. Download and import the latest version of JMRSDK package. Open and play the Focus scene from Assets/Scenes folder.
